entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
